mp_grid_clear_cell: This function can be used to clear a specific "cell" of an MP grid. Cells are not calculated as room coordinates, but rather as grid coordinates, where (0,0) is the top let corner of the grid. this means that to clear a cell at a specific position in the room, we must change the x and y coordinates into cell coordinate dividing them by the resolution of the MP grid.
